verses.text: Also, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* unto the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* against you, \w Aha|strong="H1889"\w*, even the \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* are ours in \w possession|strong="H4181"\w*:

Therefore \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because they have made \add you\add* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, and swallowed you \w up|strong="H7602"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, that ye might be a \w possession|strong="H4181"\w* unto the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and ye are taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of \w talkers|strong="H3956"\w*, and \add are\add* an \w infamy|strong="H1681"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:\f + \fr 36.3 \ft Because: Heb. Because for because\f*\f + \fr 36.3 \ft are…: or, ye are made to come up on the lip of the tongue\f*

Therefore, ye \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* to the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and to the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, to the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w*, and to the \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w*, to the \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w wastes|strong="H2723"\w*, and to the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that are \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*, which became a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w* and \w derision|strong="H3933"\w* to the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*;  +  r 36.4  t rivers: or, bottoms, or, dales *

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Surely in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of my \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* have I \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* against the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and against all \w Idumea|strong="H0123"\w*, which have \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* my \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into their \w possession|strong="H4181"\w* with the \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* of all \add their\add* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, with \w despiteful|strong="H7589"\w* \w minds|strong="H5315"\w*, to cast it \w out|strong="H4054"\w* for a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*.

\w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* therefore concerning the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and to the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, to the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w*, and to the \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in my \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* and in my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, because ye have \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* the \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*:

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I have lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, Surely the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you, they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*.

¶ But ye, O \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, ye shall shoot \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* your \w branches|strong="H6057"\w*, and \w yield|strong="H5375"\w* your \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* to my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; for they are at \w hand|strong="H7126"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.
For, behold, I \add am\add* for you, and I will \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* unto you, and ye shall be \w tilled|strong="H5647"\w* and \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*:

And I will \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* upon you, all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add even\add* all of it: and the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*, and the \w wastes|strong="H2723"\w* shall be \w builded|strong="H1129"\w*:

And I will \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* upon you \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*; and they shall \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* and bring \w fruit|strong="H6509"\w*: and I will \w settle|strong="H3427"\w* you after your old \w estates|strong="H6927"\w*, and will do \w better|strong="H2895"\w* \add unto you\add* than at your \w beginnings|strong="H7221"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Yea, I will cause \w men|strong="H0120"\w* to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* upon you, \add even\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and they shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* thee, and thou shalt be their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and thou shalt no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* henceforth \w bereave|strong="H7921"\w* them \add of men\add*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, Thou \add land\add* devourest \w up|strong="H0398"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, and hast \w bereaved|strong="H7921"\w* thy \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*;

Therefore thou shalt \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* no more, neither \w bereave|strong="H7921"\w* thy \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* any more, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 36.14 \ft bereave: or, cause to fall\f*

Neither will I cause \add men\add* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* in thee the \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* any more, neither shalt thou \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* any more, neither shalt thou cause thy \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* to \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* any more, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
¶ Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, when the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, they \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* it by their own \w way|strong="H1870"\w* and by their \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*: their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* was \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me as the \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* of a removed \w woman|strong="H5079"\w*.

Wherefore I \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon them for the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* that they had \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and for their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* \add wherewith\add* they had \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* it:

And I \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* them among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and they were \w dispersed|strong="H2219"\w* through the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*: according to their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* and according to their \w doings|strong="H5949"\w* I \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* them.

And when they \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whither they \w went|strong="H0935"\w*, they \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, when they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to them, These \add are\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and are gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ But I had \w pity|strong="H2550"\w* for mine \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, which the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whither they \w went|strong="H0935"\w*.

Therefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not \add this\add* for your sakes, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, but for mine \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, which ye have \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whither ye \w went|strong="H0935"\w*.

And I will \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* my \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, which was \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, which ye have \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them; and the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*, when I shall be \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in you before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.  +  r 36.23  t their: or, your *

For I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* you from \w among|strong="H4480"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* you out of all \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, and will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you into your own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

¶ Then will I \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* upon you, and ye shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: from all your \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w*, and from all your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, will I \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* you.

A \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* also will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you, and a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* will I \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* you: and I will take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w stony|strong="H0068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* out of your \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you an \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

And I will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* you, and \w cause|strong="H6213"\w* you to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add*.

And ye shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and ye shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

I will also \w save|strong="H3467"\w* you from all your \w uncleannesses|strong="H2932"\w*: and I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and will \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* it, and \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* no \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* upon you.

And I will \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and the \w increase|strong="H8570"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, that ye shall \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* no more \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.

Then shall ye \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* your own \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* that \add were\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and shall \w lothe|strong="H6962"\w* yourselves in your own \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* for your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* and for your \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

Not for your sakes \w do|strong="H6213"\w* I \add this\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, be it \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto you: be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* for your own \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I shall have \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* you from all your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* I will also cause \add you\add* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w wastes|strong="H2723"\w* shall be \w builded|strong="H1129"\w*.

And the \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w tilled|strong="H5647"\w*, whereas it lay \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all that passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*.

And they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w This|strong="H1977"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that was \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* is become like the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*; and the \w waste|strong="H2720"\w* and \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* and \w ruined|strong="H2040"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add are become\add* \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w*, \add and\add* are \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.

Then the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w ruined|strong="H2040"\w* \add places, and\add* \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* that that was \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*: I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, and I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will yet \add for\add* this be \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* of by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* for them; I will \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* them with \w men|strong="H0120"\w* like a \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

As the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, as the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in her solemn \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*; so shall the \w waste|strong="H2720"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* be \w filled|strong="H4392"\w* with \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*: and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 36.38 \ft holy…: Heb. flock of holy things\f*
